3: Strike Hawk has taken Kamui back. His maintenance will be handled by them this time.
That's how it should be. He can't keep hanging at our place every time.
His wounds must be really bad that he needs to be treated at their own place.
(Nods) Kamui has helped us so much. I hope he can get through this.
Even with all the bad memory he has remembered...
Perhaps it's a good thing that he doesn't do a lot of thinking then.

4: That is what's unique about him.

3: Commandant, you really like Kamui, don't you?
After what we've been through, I feel like Kamui is already one of us.
That's not up to us anyway.
It's just... it might be strange for us to say it, but emotionally speaking, I think he's indeed part of the team.
'Emotion' does sound strange coming from a Construct.
